metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30485 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in libezxml.a in ezXML 0.8.6. The function ezxml_internal_dtd(), while parsing a crafted XML file, performs incorrect memory handling, leading to a NULL pointer dereference while running strcmp() on a NULL pointer.

criterions.comment: mapcache: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
navit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
